Articles.Content:
Hi there!

I'm a long time player, new to the forums though! But I could use some help now: I've always been playing mod-less (and time-warp less, but that's another discussion, though I'm curious to know who else plays without time-warp, ever?) but recently upgraded to a better laptop. WIth the recent 1.2 release, I now wanted to explore some visual enhancement mods. Can someone give me some good suggestions, preferably compatible with CKAN?

Thanks!

Safe launches!

Hello Jerrens and welcome to the KSP Forums!

I'm not sure if they have been updated or are compatible with CKAN, but I have enjoyed Scatterer, Stock Visual Enhancements, and Distant Object Enhancement.

As far as time warp goes, I like to go interplanetary so time warp is a must for me.

Happy landings!

2 hours ago, Starhawk said:

Scatterer, Stock Visual Enhancements, and Distant Object Enhancement.

Ditto on those, they're great! Don't forget Stock Visual Terrain, though. It makes the ground look a whole lot better.

And also, welcome to the forums! We're all really nice people here.

Thanks for the welcome and the info guys!

How about EVE (Environmental Visual Enhancements)? Any experience with this one?

3 hours ago, Jerrens said:

Thanks for the welcome and the info guys!

How about EVE (Environmental Visual Enhancements)? Any experience with this one?

I believe that is one of the more popular ones.  I used it before and quite enjoyed it.

Happy landings!
